resources.string: The generated preset is likely to contain sounds with chosen keywords. Moreover, intense presets will attempt to play more sounds simultaneously.
Preset with the given name already exists!
Preset does not exist. It may have been deleted!
You haven\'t created any presets yet. To create a preset, go to the Library and play sounds. Then click on the Save button that appears on the bottom corner of the screen.
Your default launcher does not support adding shortcuts.
Show \"presets\" on app startup (requires app restart)
Noice will shutdown itself when the timer ends. Use the buttons below to add time and start the timer.
The alarm will go off in %1$s %2$s %3$s
Noice will start the selected preset when the timer ends. Use the buttons below to select a preset and set the desired time to start the wake-up timer.
Relax and improve focus with natural calming noise.
Use Noice to cast its ambience to other Chromecast enabled devices such as speakers, TVs, etc.
Swipe left to get to know all the features!
After playing a few sounds, you can use the save button in the bottom end corner to save your mix. To reuse a stored mix, go to "presets" list from the bottom bar.
Use the volume slider to adjust sound volumes. At each repetition of non-looping sounds, a delay period is selected randomly from the range set by the time slider.
A little ambience can help you fall asleep effortlessly. Use the sleep timer to let Noice shut itself down. Similarly, to wake up to a calm environment, use the wake-up timer to set the alarm.
Trouble falling asleep or waking up?
If you have not purchased the premium subscription, you can make a one-time payment. It will help us sustain the development of the free features and keep them ad-free forever.
Your payment will be securely handled by Google Play. Depending on your location, additional taxes _may be_ added to the final amount.
We wholeheartedly thank you for your generous contribution to the Noice project.
You can also help us by telling your friends about us. More users will provide us feedback from several different perspectives and help us improve our services.

We\'d love to hear from you about the app. Please take a moment to visit our GitHub repository. If you didn\'t love the app, please consider opening up an issue explaining your concerns. Otherwise, please star the project to show love and support.
Preset has been removed from app shortcuts!
Preset has been added to app shortcuts!
Failed to add the preset to app shortcuts!
Time duration for fading-in sounds (in seconds)
Time duration for fading-out sounds (in seconds)
Failed to add the shortcut to the home screen!
Shortcut has been added to the home screen!
Pause when other apps play audio
Do not react when other apps play audio
Export the current snapshot of the saved presets to an external file
Importing saved presets from an external file will overwrite existing presets, if any
It will remove all preset shortcuts from the app shortcut menu. Do you want to proceed?
All app shortcuts have been removed!
Failure on writing to the selected file!
Successfully exported presets to the file!
Failure on reading the selected file!
The import file format is invalid!
Successfully imported presets from the file!

We collect app usage data to improve user experience. We also collect app behaviour data to analyse and diagnose errors encountered during app usage. Read our [privacy policy](https://trynoice.com/privacy-policy) for further information.\n\n You can configure automatic data sharing at any time inside the app by going to \"**Settings** > **Share usage and behaviour data**\".
Automatically share usage and behaviour data with the developers
Failed to load in-app purchase details. Please try again later!
Failed to start payment flow. Please try again later!
We\'ll notify you as soon as we finish processing your payment.
Use hardware media buttons to control playback
Please enter your email to sign-in.
Please enter your name and email to sign-up.
Your email is temporarily locked from making sign-in attempts until %1$s.
We\'ve emailed you a sign-in link at \"%1$s\".
We\'ve emailed you a sign-in link at \"%1$s\" if this address belongs to a registered account.
Please open the received link using Noice to complete the sign-in process.
Uh-oh! We couldn\'t find a mailbox app on your device!
The sign-in link appears to be invalid. It may have expired. Please try again!

On deleting your account, you will immediately lose access to your profile. If you have an ongoing subscription, it will be cancelled. Please note that it may take us a while to completely erase your data from our servers.
The entered email is associated with another account.
Your account details were updated successfully.
Uh-oh! We were unable to process your payment. The amount should be automatically refunded if deducted. If you do not get your refund within a week, please notify us.
Please sign-in or sign-up to continue.

Uh-oh! We had some trouble while waiting for the payment confirmation. It may be due to a network error or a delay from the payment provider. We\'ll update your subscription status as soon as we hear from the provider. Please check your subscription status after some time.
Thank you for subscribing to Noice Premium. Your subscription is now active.
Payment is pending for this purchase.
We cancelled this purchase and initiated a refund for it.

Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription to Noice Premium\? Upon cancellation, your subscription will automatically terminate at the end of the current billing cycle. Your current billing cycle ends on %1$s.
We don\'t think that you have tried Noice Premium yet. Your previous subscriptions will appear here once you have used Noice Premium at least once.
Oops! We couldn\'t fetch your account details. %1$s
Oh no! We couldn\'t cancel your subscription. %1$s Please try again!
Oh no! We couldn\'t delete your account. %1$s Please try again!
Oh no! We couldn\'t update your details. %1$s Please try again!
Oops! We couldn\'t start the billing flow. %1$s Please try again!
Oops! We couldn\'t fetch the sound library. %1$s
Uh-oh! We couldn\'t email you a sign-in link. %1$s Please try again later!
Oh no! We couldn\'t sign you out. %1$s Please try again!
Oops! We couldn\'t fetch subscription plans. %1$s
Uh-oh! We couldn\'t fetch your subscription purchase history. %1$s
The maximum audio quality for streaming. Medium, High and Ultra only work when you\'re subscribed.
The preset URL appears to be invalid!
Oh no! We couldn\'t load sound keywords. %1$s Please try again!
Uh-oh! We failed to generate a preset. %1$s Please try again!
By continuing, you agree to our [Terms of Service](https://trynoice.com/terms-of-service) and [Privacy Policy](https://trynoice.com/privacy-policy).
The entered gift card code is invalid!
Oops! We couldn\'t fetch the gift card. %1$s
The gift card with the given code has already been redeemed.
The gift card with the given code has expired.
Redeeming this gift card will offer you the premium subscription until %1$s.
Oh no! We couldn\'t redeem your gift card. %1$s
Write a review on Google Play
